name: OnMyWay
overview:
OnMyWay is a social recruiting platform designed to help recruiters and hiring managers more efficiently find and hire the best talent from across the social landscape. Using patent pending algorithms, the platform was created to provide a unified view of each candidate by combining aggregated data from active social profiles.

TalentSearch provides the easiest way to source talented people across the social web. TalentSearch’ʹs patent pending algorithm indexes active social networks to gather information around a candidate’s skills, interests and activities. Each unified profile includes direct contact information, such as phone and email, allowing recruiters to communicate with qualified candidates directly, at the right time, across the right channels. Whether searching for IT professionals, Sales, Marketing or support personnel, TalentSearch delivers the people recruiter’s need, when they need them.

iMatch automatically locates qualified candidates based on open job requirements and delivers these candidates directly to your inbox. iMatch’ʹs proprietary algorithm indexes professionals across all major social networks and identifies characteristics that indicate change as well as skills that match your requirements. No more waiting for unqualified candidates to apply to antiquated job postings.

Refresh 360 provides companies with existing candidate databases the ability to automatically update and refresh resumes with the most recent information from a candidate’s active social profiles. Through the easy to use interface, companies have the ability to search and locate existing candidates with updated skills and experience and match them to their current open positions. Don’ʹt search outside when you may already have the right candidate’s right in front of you.
